newsitem.title: UK: UK'S Major sees jobless rate falling further.
newsitem.headline: UK'S Major sees jobless rate falling further.

text.p: Prime Minister John Major said on Wednesday he saw no sign of an end to the falling trend in British unemployment.

Speaking at an election rally for supporters of his Conservative party, Major contrasted "distressingly high" unemployment rates in continental Europe of 10 to 12 percent with the situation in Britain "as we move down towards six percent with every indication that its going to go on falling, putting more and more of our people back into work."
